content: *this beautiful motif flower scarf will keep you warm in the winter lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80690ad wool-ease® thick & quick® article #640 3 colors 1 ball each *shown in apricot claret snapdragon * crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm gauge 1 motif = 9 in 23 cm diameter make 9 motifs 5 color sequences are provided sew motifs together to form a strip to finish
